title: Bug 120922 - "Dirty Page" behavior in XML Report Designer editor needs improvement
description: Bug 120922 - "Dirty Page" behavior in XML Report Designer editor needs improvement. Other pages cannot be used until the source is saved. And then the user needs to figure out how to save or discard their changes. The dialog is titled "Error".
OB: When editing the XML in the "source" view of the Layout Editor and then trying to switch back to the Layout view, an error message is displayed indicating that the changes need to be saved. The error message states "Source page is dirty."
EB: The behavior should be improved. A better approach would be to clearly indicate that the XML Report Design has been changed and the user should be provided with options to save or discard the changes. The dialog title should be more appropriate and should not contain quotes.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
  1. Open the XML Report Designer
  2. Edit the XML in the "source" view
  3. Attempt to switch back to the Layout view
  4. Observe the error message and the lack of options to save or discard changes
